title: DSA Level 7 â€” Trees & BST
concept: Binary tree traversals, height, diameter, BST operations and searching.

challenges.title: Preorder Traversal of Binary Tree
challenges.description: Print the preorder traversal of a binary tree given in level-order form with -1 representing NULL nodes.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: integer N (number of nodes including -1). Second line: N integers (level order with -1 for null).
challenges.outputDescription: Preorder traversal values separated by spaces (skip -1).

challenges.title: Inorder Traversal of Binary Tree
challenges.description: Print inorder traversal of a binary tree.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers (level order, -1 for null).
challenges.outputDescription: Inorder traversal values separated by spaces.

challenges.title: Postorder Traversal of Binary Tree
challenges.description: Print postorder traversal of a binary tree.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers (level order, -1 for null).
challenges.outputDescription: Postorder traversal values separated by spaces.

challenges.title: Level Order Traversal
challenges.description: Print the level order traversal of a binary tree using a queue.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers (level order, -1 for null).
challenges.outputDescription: Level order traversal values separated by spaces (ignore -1 placeholders).

challenges.title: Height of Binary Tree
challenges.description: Find the height (maximum depth) of a binary tree.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers (level order, -1 for null).
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: height of the tree (height of single node tree is 1).

challenges.title: Diameter of Binary Tree
challenges.description: Compute the diameter of a binary tree (number of nodes on the longest path between any two nodes).
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers (level order, -1 for null).
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: diameter of the tree.

challenges.title: Search in BST
challenges.description: Given a Binary Search Tree and a value X, print 1 if X exists in the BST, else 0.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers (keys to insert into BST in given order). Third line: X.

challenges.title: Insert into BST
challenges.description: Insert X into a Binary Search Tree and print the inorder traversal after insertion.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers (initial keys). Third line: X.

challenges.title: Delete from BST
challenges.description: Delete node with value X from a BST and print inorder traversal after deletion. If X not present, print original inorder.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers (keys). Third line: X.

challenges.title: Lowest Common Ancestor in BST
challenges.description: Given a BST and two values a and b, find their Lowest Common Ancestor (LCA).
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers (keys). Third line: a b.
